score - Variable in class millionaire.Model.Player
 
SECOND_5_QUESTIONS - Static variable in class millionaire.FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.SoundEffectName
 
sendToDB(String[]) - Method in class millionaire.Model.Game
This method will send information from javafx to database
setAction() - Method in class millionaire.View.LifeLine
Creating lambda expressions when clicking at the lifeline to clear the lifelinehint,
disable current lifeline, disable the withdrawbutton, disable the answerbuttons,
temporarily disable the other lifelines, play a sound, stopping the timer and activate the lifeline.
setActions() - Method in class millionaire.View.QuestionArea
It sets (define) actions to every option button which question area have(A,B,C,D).
setAnswer(char) - Method in class millionaire.Controller
setAnswer() will be called when the player will select an answer for the question.
setAnswer(char) - Method in class millionaire.View.QuestionArea
It sets the player answer (it will be called when the player select an answer on a question).
setAsDisabled() - Method in class millionaire.View.OptionButton
It disables the option button.
setAsUsed() - Method in class millionaire.View.LifeLine
Setting the lifeline as used to prevent the player to use it again.
setBehavior(LifeLineBehavior) - Method in class millionaire.Model.LifeLine
It will set a behavior to a life line that don't have a behavior.
setCheckData(String, String, String) - Method in class millionaire.View.EndGameScreen
This method take in three arguments and set the value to player's name, balance and date to the paycheck to assign player's name, balance and date for paycheck.
setCurrentPlace(int) - Method in class millionaire.View.PriceTable
This method will set the circle to visible at the current balance players have and will show the orange background(PriceLabel(level and balance)) at a current game's level.
setFont(Font) - Method in class millionaire.View.OptionButton
It sets the font of the text label of the option button object.
setLifeLineHint(String) - Method in class millionaire.View.LifeLineArea
Setting the lifeline hints from the audience or the friend.
setLifeLineHint(String, byte) - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
Push the hint forward, reset timer, enable actions and play a sound.
setName(String) - Method in class millionaire.Model.Player
player name setter
setOptionButtonState(char, int) - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
It set Option button state. see QuestionArea.setOptionButtonState(char, int)
setOptionButtonState(char, int) - Method in class millionaire.View.QuestionArea
It changes the style (state) of an option buttons that question area have depending on optionButtonSymbol value.
setQuestion() - Method in class millionaire.Controller
this method brings the question and its options and send them to View (gui) that will show it on the screen.
setQuestion(String[]) - Method in class millionaire.Controller
Its overloading of Controller.setQuestion() and it used when the gui need to be updated after using change question or remove half life lines.
setQuestions() - Method in class millionaire.Model.Game
It be called to get the needed questions from the back-end.
setSecondsColor() - Method in class millionaire.View.TimerLabel
It changes timer text color depending on its value.
setState(int) - Method in class millionaire.View.OptionButton
It changes the style (state) of an option button depending on the possible state value (see the static variables at the start of the class).
setText(String) - Method in class millionaire.View.OptionButton
It sets a text inside text label of the option button object.
setupController(Game, Gui) - Static method in class millionaire.Controller
 
setupJsonData(String) - Method in class millionaire.Model.Game
 
setupJsonData(String) - Method in interface millionaire.Model.GetJson
It will have behavior to handle json (data) text for example set every json object in a question object from questions array inside game class.
show() - Static method in class millionaire.View.AliasScreen
Method showing the object AliasScreen and sets the lambda expressions needed
when pressing enter or click at confirmbutton.
show() - Method in class millionaire.View.IntroScreen
It shows game intro screen.
show() - Static method in class millionaire.View.PlayScreen
It shows game play screen.
show(String, String, String) - Static method in class millionaire.View.EndGameScreen
This method will firstly set the value of player's name, balance and date to the EndGameScreen's object after the game ends with the purpose later to update to database.
showCircle() - Method in class millionaire.View.PriceLabel
This method will show the visibility of the circle.
showEndGameScreen(String, String, String) - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
It shows EndGameScreen (the screen that will show money check with player information (name, balance,game date))
shownSeconds - Variable in class millionaire.View.TimerLabel
 
SoundEffectName - Variable in class millionaire.View.LifeLine
It store audio tuck name that is related to a life line.
SoundEffectName() - Constructor for class millionaire.FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.SoundEffectName
 
SoundEffectPlayer - Class in millionaire.View
Abstract class for handling the sounds and its a part of the View.
SoundEffectPlayer() - Constructor for class millionaire.View.SoundEffectPlayer
 
start(Stage) - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
It runs after calling launch(args) that is inside launchGui().
startTheGame(String) - Method in class millionaire.Controller
start new game for user and name, questions and seconds on timer will start
startTimer() - Method in class millionaire.View.TimerLabel
It starts the timer.
stop() - Method in class millionaire.Model.ChangeQuestion
It uses to make isRunning member variable equals to false.
stop() - Static method in class millionaire.View.SoundEffectPlayer
Stopping the sound.
stopTimer() - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
It stops game timer. see TimerLabel.stopTimer()
stopTimer() - Method in class millionaire.View.TimerLabel
It stops the timer.
switchToUsedImage() - Method in class millionaire.View.LifeLine
To switch image to the one with a red cross when used the lifeline.
